metadata.title: Azure Administrator Mastery
metadata.subtitle: Advanced Azure administration skills
metadata.description: Master advanced Azure administration techniques including automation, security, and optimization. Take your Azure skills to the expert level.
prerequisites: Understanding of Azure networking and security concepts

overview.summary: Azure Administrator Mastery training takes your Azure administration skills to the expert level. Learn advanced techniques for managing complex Azure environments, implementing automation, and optimizing performance.
overview.targetAudience: Azure administrators who have AZ-104 certification and want to master advanced Azure administration techniques for enterprise environments.

sections.content:
Enterprise Resource Management

Learn advanced techniques for managing Azure resources in large-scale enterprise environments with proper governance and automation.

sections.title: Advanced Management Tools
items: Azure Bicep for infrastructure as code

modules.title: Azure Automation and DevOps
objectives: Create PowerShell and Azure CLI scripts

sections.content: Automation is key to efficient Azure administration. Learn to automate routine tasks and implement DevOps practices for infrastructure management.

sections.caption: Azure Automation, PowerShell, and DevOps integration

sections.content:
Advanced Security Implementation

Security is critical in enterprise environments. Learn to implement comprehensive security controls and compliance frameworks.

labs.title: Security Implementation Lab
labs.description: Implement advanced security and compliance solutions

sections.content: Effective cost and performance management is essential for enterprise Azure deployments. Learn to optimize your Azure environment for both performance and cost efficiency.

certification.name: Azure Administrator Mastery Certification
certification.description: Demonstrate mastery of advanced Azure administration techniques, automation, and enterprise-scale management

faq.question: Do I need AZ-104 certification?
faq.answer: Yes, this is an advanced course that requires AZ-104 certification and practical Azure administration experience.

faq.question: What scripting languages are covered?
faq.answer: The course covers PowerShell, Azure CLI, and Azure Resource Manager templates extensively.

faq.question: Is this course technical?
faq.answer: Yes, this is a highly technical course focused on advanced Azure administration techniques and automation.

faq.question: What Azure services will I learn?
faq.answer: You'll learn advanced usage of Azure Resource Manager, Azure Automation, Azure Security Center, Azure Monitor, and many other services.
